From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

>::Prowl::
>
>Prowl speeds up, managing to avoid all but four of the lasers. The
>four that hit him hit him in the stomach and chest, leaving smoking
>dents in his armor. He aims his missiles, firing two more at
>Wildrider and then flying away from the bot.

Wildrider leaps up, avoiding the first missile, but he lands just in time
to be hit by the second. A huge explosion sends him careening back. "Ohhh,
time to pick an easier target" he says as he transforms into car before
hitting the ground, and then gunning it towards Hot Rod.
